about_the_game:
After crashing into an Alien planet called Yolk, You find yourself oblivious and left alone with your AI companion , Find your way through the unknown, discover the mysteries of Yolk and find out what happened to you and everyone else!

In this action-adventure experience, players find themselves stranded in an alien planet called Yolk,
The main objective of this game is to survive harsh threats of the Yolk and uncover the protagonist's lost memories, players will face numerous threats including Alien species ,Cyborgs, Drones, Anomaly entities, Corrupted Robots which once were used to serve human scientists on Yolk research stations. Moreover, there are numerous unknown mysteries and hidden threats waiting to be discovered.



In Distorted Echos, Players can find and use various tools and equipment, Including Weapons, crafting materials, Scanners , explosives and etc. this game supports inventory management system which allows the player to carry, craft ,consume and manage different items depending on their goals. Also players occasionally need to solve puzzles and challenges such as Security hacks and overriding control panels to proceed forward in the story.



The environment in this game includes vast terrains with abandoned research stations, Mysterious Monuments, and structures with secret obscurities. Throughout the story, player has an AI companion named F.L.A.R.A which assists the player with her tips and helps to narrate the story during the gameplay.

This game is currently in development stage and yet to be released, according to the game's road map ,further features have been planned to be developed in future design pipeline, including more environmental Threats and events such as Acid Rains and Meteor showers, Player Buildable structures such as Tents , Shelter and extended levels and environment design.
detailed_description:
Development Update, Extensive Changes

Massive Development Update: Jan 2024


  • Co-op Multiplayer Support is being added to the game, at the current development roadmap players will be able to have a party of 3 people to co-op with

  • Full Item Crafting System Has been Added to the game, Players now are able to Craft more advanced items from the primary items they find in the game. Crafting Can be conducted using different fabricators. Fabricators have different number of item slots depending on the type of fabricator. Over 70 new items have been added to the game and craft system, including different types of projectiles, Spears, Mines, build structures such as walls, Platforms, Stairs, Power generating items such as Fuels, Electric generators and many more.

  • Full mining system has been added to the game, Players now Can mine resources to craft items

  • Day/Night Cycle, Dynamic Weather System, Environmental Hazards and other Dynamic Environment elements have been added to the game, Players now have a clock indicating the current time of day. Realtime Sunset and sunrise with dynamic change of Day/Night visual Effects. Environmental Hazards Such as Sandstorm, Acid rain and Meteor shower have been added, As well as shelters to shield from such hazards

  • Vehicles have been added to the game, Players are now able to use vehicles such as Hovercrafts to and Rover to navigate through the map.some vehicles require power, fuel and some can carry multiple players, hook other items, attach weapons and so on.

  • Player Ability system has been added to the game, Player now can Slide, use jetpacks, extract minerals, Use scanner and have different types of close and long range attacks, with new weapons and new AI NPCs to fight with

The biggest Update so far is under development, Stay Tuned for more, more than 70 Items are to be added to the game. A list of the developed items will be released in a patch note soon.

name: Distorted Echos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system ,Windows 7 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system ,Windows 7 or Higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / Ryzen 9 5000 Series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
